casebody.data:
Jose Luis VILLEGAS, petitioner,
v.
TEXAS. No. 13-9715 (13A1036). Supreme Court of the United States April 16, 2014.

Application for stay of execution of sentence of death presented to Justice SCALIA and by him referred to the Court denied.

Justice GINSBURG, Justice BREYER, Justice SOTOMAYOR, and Justice KAGAN would grant the application for stay of execution.
